verses.verse: אָ֖ז <WH227> Then אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Then said שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> Solomon יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אָמַ֔ר <WH559> hath said לִשְׁכּ֖וֹן <WH7931> that he would dwell בָּעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> in the thick darkness

וַֽאֲנִ֛י <WH589> I בָּנִ֥יתִי <WH1129> But I have built בֵית־ <WH1004> an house זְבֻ֖ל <WH2073> of habitation לָ֑ךְ וּמָכ֥וֹן <WH4349> for thee and a place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <WH3427> for thy dwelling עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <WH5769> for ever

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <WH5437> turned הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face וַיְבָ֕רֶךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְכָל־ <WH3605> all קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עוֹמֵֽד׃ <WH5975> stood

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> [that] which he spake בְּפִ֔יו <WH6310> with his mouth אֵ֖ת <WH853> דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> David אָבִ֑י <WH1> to my father וּבְיָדָ֥יו <WH3027> who hath with his hands מִלֵּ֖א <WH4390> fulfilled לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִן־ <WH4480> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> i הוֹצֵ֣אתִי <WH3318> that I brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֮ <WH5971> my people מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt לֹא־ <WH3808> nor בָחַ֣רְתִּֽי <WH977> I chose בְעִ֗יר <WH5892> no city מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> in that my name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> might be there וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor בָחַ֣רְתִּֽי <WH977> might be there neither chose בְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> I any man לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become נָגִ֖יד <WH5057> to be a ruler עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וָאֶבְחַר֙ <WH977> But I have chosen בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> that my name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> might be there וָאֶבְחַ֣ר <WH977> might be there and have chosen בְּדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> David לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> to be over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> to be over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבַ֖ב <WH3824> Now it was in the heart דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> But the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> to David אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> Forasmuch as it was in thine heart לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> for my name הֱ‍ֽטִיב֔וֹתָ <WH2895> thou didst well כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> in that it was in thine heart

רַ֣ק <WH7535> Notwithstanding אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִבְנֶ֖ה <WH1129> thou shalt not build הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> the house כִּ֤י <WH3588> but בִנְךָ֙ <WH1121> but thy son הַיּוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> which shall come forth מֵֽחֲלָצֶ֔יךָ <WH2504> out of thy loins הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> for my name

וַיָּ֣קֶם <WH6965> therefore hath performed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֖וֹ <WH1697> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> that he hath spoken וָאָק֡וּם <WH6965> for I am risen up תַּחַת֩ <WH8478> the place דָּוִ֨יד <WH1732> in the room of David אָבִ֜י <WH1> my father וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב ׀ <WH3427> and am set עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> promised יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> as the LORD וָאֶבְנֶ֣ה <WH1129> and have built הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וָאָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> have I put שָׁם֙ <WH8033> And in it אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> There בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> wherein [is] the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖ת <WH3772> that he made עִם־ <WH5973> with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <WH5975> And he stood לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> the presence כָּל־ <WH3605> of all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> in the presence of all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּפְרֹ֖שׂ <WH6566> and spread forth כַּפָּֽיו׃ <WH3709> his hands

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Now עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> For Solomon כִּיּ֣וֹר <WH3595> scaffold נְחֹ֗שֶׁת <WH5178> a brasen וַֽיִּתְּנֵהוּ֮ <WH5414> and had set בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> it in the midst הָעֲזָרָה֒ <WH5835> of the court חָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> of five אַמּ֜וֹת <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֗וֹ <WH753> long וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five אַמּוֹת֙ <WH520> cubits רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> broad וְאַמּ֥וֹת <WH520> cubits שָׁל֖וֹשׁ <WH7969> and three קוֹמָת֑וֹ <WH6967> high וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> and upon it he stood עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> on וַיִּבְרַ֤ךְ <WH1288> and kneeled down עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכָּיו֙ <WH1290> upon his knees נֶ֚גֶד <WH5048> the presence כָּל־ <WH3605> of all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> before all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> and spread forth כַּפָּ֖יו <WH3709> his hands הַשָּׁמָֽיְמָה׃ <WH8064> toward heaven

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֵין־ <WH369> there כָּמ֣וֹךָ <WH3644> like אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [there is] no God בַּשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> like thee in the heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> nor in the earth שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> which keepest הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> and [shewest] mercy לַעֲבָדֶ֕יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants הַהֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> that walk לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבָּֽם׃ <WH3820> thee with all their hearts

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <WH8104> Thou which hast kept לְעַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> with thy servant דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> David אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father אֵ֥ת <WH854> that אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> that which thou hast promised ל֑וֹ וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> him and spakest בְּפִ֛יךָ <WH6310> with thy mouth וּבְיָדְךָ֥ <WH3027> [it] with thine hand מִלֵּ֖אתָ <WH4390> and hast fulfilled כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> is this

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> Now therefore O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁ֠מֹר <WH8104> keep לְעַבְדְּךָ֨ <WH5650> with thy servant דָוִ֤יד <WH1732> David אָבִי֙ <WH1> my father אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֤רְתָּ <WH1696> that which thou hast promised לּוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִכָּרֵ֨ת <WH3772> There shall not fail לְךָ֥ אִישׁ֙ <WH376> thee a man מִלְּפָנַ֔י <WH6440> in my sight יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> to sit עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> upon the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel רַ֠ק <WH7535> yet so אִם־ <WH518> if יִשְׁמְר֨וּ <WH8104> take heed בָנֶ֜יךָ <WH1121> that thy children אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכָּ֗ם <WH1870> to their way לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> as thou hast walked בְּת֣וֹרָתִ֔י <WH8451> in my law כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָלַ֖כְתָּ <WH1980> have walked לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Now then O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel יֵֽאָמֵן֙ <WH539> be verified דְּבָ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1697> let thy word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> which thou hast spoken לְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> unto thy servant לְדָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> David

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for הַֽאֻמְנָ֔ם <WH552> in very deed יֵשֵׁ֧ב <WH3427> dwell אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> But will God אֶת־ <WH854> with הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> with men עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> common הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> behold שָׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> and the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֤י <WH8064> of heavens הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> heaven לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְכַלְכְּל֔וּךָ <WH3557> cannot contain אַ֕ף <WH637> how כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> thee how much less this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנִֽיתִי׃ <WH1129> which I have built

וּפָנִ֜יתָ <WH6437> Have respect אֶל־ <WH413> to תְּפִלַּ֧ת <WH8605> therefore to the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֛ <WH5650> of thy servant וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to תְּחִנָּת֖וֹ <WH8467> and to his supplication יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God לִשְׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> to hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to הָרִנָּה֙ <WH7440> unto the cry וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַתְּפִלָּ֔ה <WH8605> and the prayer אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> which thy servant מִתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> prayeth לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before

לִהְיוֹת֩ <WH1961> become עֵינֶ֨יךָ <WH5869> That thine eyes פְתֻח֜וֹת <WH6605> may be open אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> upon this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> upon the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָמַ֔רְתָּ <WH559> whereof thou hast said לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> that thou wouldest put שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> thy name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there לִשְׁמ֙וֹעַ֙ <WH8085> there to hearken אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַתְּפִלָּ֔ה <WH8605> unto the prayer אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> prayeth עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> which thy servant אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> toward this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְשָׁ֨מַעְתָּ֜ <WH8085> Hearken אֶל־ <WH413> toward תַּחֲנוּנֵ֤י <WH8469> therefore unto the supplications עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> of thy servant וְעַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> and of thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when יִֽתְפַּֽלְל֖וּ <WH6419> which they shall make אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> toward this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְ֠אַתָּה <WH859> you תִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> hear מִמְּק֤וֹם <WH4725> place שִׁבְתְּךָ֙ <WH3427> thou from thy dwelling מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> [even] from heaven וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֖ <WH8085> and when thou hearest וְסָלָֽחְתָּ׃ <WH5545> forgive
